ValidationRule.description: If Artifact Type is "Software" or "Bundle" then S3Path is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( FS_Artifact_Type__c , "Software") ,ISPICKVAL( FS_Artifact_Type__c , "Bundle")) , OR(AND(ISBLANK( FS_S3Path__c ),ISBLANK( Settings_Update__c )),AND(NOT(ISBLANK( FS_S3Path__c )),NOT(ISBLANK( Settings_Update__c ))),AND(ISBLANK( FS_S3Path__c ),NOT(ISBLANK( Settings_Update__c)))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "S3Path" is required and "Settings Update" should be blank, if Artifact Type is "Software" or "Bundle"
